entries.meaning: (sports, uncountable) A sport in which two opposing teams of five players strive to put a ball through a hoop.
(countable) The particular kind of ball used in the sport of basketball.

verbs.description: basketball (third-person singular simple present basketballs, present participle basketballing, simple past and past participle basketballed)

examples: by high school he was basketballing with the best of an all-Negro league

entries.meaning: To throw in a similar way to when shooting a basketball
examples: He took a sip from a paper coffee-cup , crumpled it up and basketballed it into a small rubbish bin about five feet from him.
